extendedInfo.description: Easycallback is your mobile dialer for cheap international calls from your Android smartphone with 3G or Wifi. Download our free calling app, create an account, add some calling credit and start saving immediately on your mobile costs. No steady 3G/WiFi connection is needed, most weak network connections will suffice to use our 3G/WiFi mobile dialer! Easycallback is also the best option to save on your mobile phone costs when exceeding your operator's monthly plan, or when roaming, our cheap calling rates are much cheaper than those of your operator with the best call quality available.Here is how Easycallback works:1.First, Easycallback will call your phone number.2.Once connected, Easycallback will call your destination phone number.3.Enjoy low cost wifi/3G calls with Easycallback  !Easycallback offers the best quality calls available on Android, making cheap android calls has never been easier!Try it now and make your first call for free!Using our app as a default dialer may interfere with dialing 911 emergency services.
